overview: When bookie Ron Jeremy takes a huge bet on Texas to win the Super Bowl, he decides to take matters into his own hands. So to speak. He sends his saucy secretary Steffi off to the team's training camp -- along with some of her sexiest, most irresistible gal pals. The idea is to have so much sex with the guys on the team that they're all worn out by game time. Steffi signs up the luscious likes of Sunset Thomas and Debi Diamond to help in her passionate plan, and together the gals go all-out to seduce every player they can find. The stage is set for non-stop action and eroticism as the leggy lust bunnies pull out all the stops. It's locker room lust at its most explosive as Debbie does Dallas again -- and again!
title: Debbie Does Dallas Again!!!!
